title: Nepal News English
description: Twitter news aggregator for Nepal from 15+ sources, rebuilt with Node.js and MySQL, running on Google Cloud Run.
notes: Aggregates news about Nepal from 15+ sources
Rebuilt in 2019 with Node.js and MySQL
Runs on Google Cloud Run as serverless containers
Follow on Twitter for English-language Nepal news

title: AU Tech Jobs
description: Tech job aggregator with 2700+ jobs from 95+ companies.
notes: Job description summary for easy reading
Tag jobs as non-technical via external categorization service
Saved jobs and applied jobs tracking
Indicates if a company sponsors work visas
extraNotes: This side project has been a joint effort of more than two dozen people. I thank each and every one of them for their time and support. This project was seeded from Australian companies providing work visa sponsorship GitHub repo I started in late 2018.
